TestDescription.name: Java object deserialization of user-supplied data
TestDescription.Description: It was determined that your web application is performing Java object deserialization of user-supplied data. Arbitrary object deserialization is inherently unsafe, and should never be performed on untrusted data. Consult Web references section for more information about this issue.
TestDescription.Impact: Web applications that accept untrusted data to deserialize may be exploited to run arbitrary code in some situations (e.g. have Apache commons-collections library in the classpath).
TestDescription.Recommendation: Java object deserialization should not be performed on user-supplied data.
